Official: New Reim Command - REIM CLEAR

4
Evarin
Monday, November 27th, 2017, 5:37:40 PM

Quote from GM Retser:

Hey everyone,

I added in a command, REIM CLEAR, to allow for you to prematurely stop your current quest. This will end your timer and allow you to re-enter under a different cooldown if it is available.

IE: Starting your quest with a paid entry before your premium entry and wanting to use your premium entry sooner.

Please note that this is permanent, it has a confirmation, and there are no refunds for accidental use of this. Use of this command outside of its intended use can lead to punishment.

Retser, ASGM

JNewhall
Monday, November 27th, 2017, 5:45:03 PM

What is its intended use? I don't get it.

Evarin
Monday, November 27th, 2017, 5:46:40 PM

I only skimmed the thread talking about it, but there is some issue with getting locked out of Reim or "wasting" some aspect of your time there that this command can alleviate.

Retser
Tuesday, November 28th, 2017, 2:21:00 PM

If your premium timer has an hour left and you enter with a paid entry and then want to re-enter with a premium entry... you would then need to wait out the full 2 hour timer before being able to use it, thereby forcing people to only use paid entries after that point.
